articles.author: Caroline O'Donovan, Taylor Telford, Jaclyn Peiser
articles.title: Tech leaders’ alliance with Trump is tested by a killing in Minneapolis - The Washington Post
articles.description: Silence from top executives who once criticized President Donald Trump has sparked frustration as senior Silicon Valley figures speak out against his immigration policy.
articles.content: As Minneapolis residents gathered at snowy vigils Saturday night to mourn the death of a neighbor shot by federal immigration agents, tech industry leaders including Apple chief executive Tim Cook an… [+201 chars]
